mapper.select: select rb.no ,user_no userNo ,u.name ,title ,hit ,to_char(reg_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') regDate ,group_no groupNo ,order_no orderNo ,depth from rboard rb, users u where rb.user_no = u.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc

select rb.no ,user_no userNo ,u.name ,title ,content ,hit ,to_char(reg_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') regDate ,group_no groupNo ,order_no orderNo ,depth from rboard rb, users u where rb.user_no = u.no and rb.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update rboard set order_no = order_no+1 where group_no = #{no} and order_no > 1
mapper.select: select group_no groupNo ,order_no+1 orderNo ,depth+1 depth from rboard where no = #{no}
